subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The French skipper Franck Cammas and his crew aboard the multihull Groupama 3 beat the around-the-world sailing record by more than two days to take the Jules Verne Trophy.
snippet: The French skipper Franck Cammas and his crew aboard the multihull Groupama 3 beat the around-the-world sailing record by more than two days to take the Jules Verne Trophy.
